item.description:
Description: When Lei Wang first came up with the idea of mountain climbing, she was barely in shape enough to get to work on a snowy day!

Now she has skied to both the North Pole and South Pole. She has climbed six of the Seven Summits—the highest mountain peaks on every continent—and her goal is to join the ranks of a handful of elite climbers who have scaled all seven.

With only Mt. Everest left, she is well on her way to becoming the first Chinese woman in history to accomplish this feat.

Come chat with this local adventurer and hear her inspirational story.

Read more about Lei at her website: http://leisventures.c...

For more info go to: BCNC.net

If possible and you are on facebook go to:

http://www.facebook.c...
to rsvp with BCNC or mail them at info@bcnc.net or call: 617-635-5129. Butif not possible, rsvp is not required.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Meet Lei Wang, Elite Mountain Climber
